entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow markup extension error #4974
  • Build fails when Powershell fails to load libpsl on M1 mac #4972
  • ResourceDictionary does not allow removing or modifying styles with classes, i.e. not hot reload friendly #4969
  • Shell Navgitation to Modal Page loads page over app boundaries in Android #4961
  • Proposal for new API to create Behaviors #4958

Closed

  • VS 2022 17.2.0 preview 1 - Cant compile project because of MAUI:GridLayout #4966
  • Unexpected end of stream on com.android.okhttp.Address@537f9da6 #4836
  • [Bug] The Windows ImageDirectory property is weird and not very user-friendly #886
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • .net MAUI on WEB #4941
    Future
  • Not possible to include a RazorClassLibrary in a .NET Maui App targetting Android #4898
  • StartTimer - remove #3950
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting macOS from Windows #4923
  • Location Allow Once vs Always #4790
  • Android and iOS devices not available debug window after installing Preview 13 (VS 2022 17.2.0 P1) #4932
  • Visual Studio 2022 preview dot net maui preview 13 #4894
  • [Bug] CollectionView not working #2929
  • QR and Barcode Scanning #4960
  • [Android emulator] MAUI Blazor essentials camera exception #4597
  • [Bug] Frame CornerRadius Not working properly when Margin is setup to minus value (push to top) #4656
  • [Bug] [Android] Modal content not resizing #3494
  • VS 17.1 prv2: default maui builds and deploys Windows but fails to build Android with error shown #4593
  • [Windows] The shadow doesn't shows when using the GraphicsView #3762
  • [Bug] AppActions and other gestures trigger multiple windows or instances to display #3199
  • HarmonyOS support #2405
    Future
  • [Bug] Button VisualState doesn't reset after Pressed #4930

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Application.Properties implementation #4976
  • Update Development Guide dotnet sources #4975
  • Update powershell version #4973
  • Add Emscripten back to rollback file #4971
  • Fix up tests after Shell runs #4970
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker

Merged

  • [Android] Update the DatePicker Dialog if the display info changes #4815
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in ScrollView IsEnabled property #4881
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Move TabbedPageHandler to TabbedViewHandler #4893
  • [Android] Clear focus and hide keyboard submitting the text or disabling the View #4828
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Use bash to install dotnet rather than sh #4916
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove `IPlatformServices.RequestedTheme` and use Essentials #4964
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Remove IImageSourceServiceConfiguration #4954
    area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Update PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md #4965
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add more APIs to IDispatcher #4944
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/animation 🎬, p/0, Cost:M, Status:InProgress, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [X] remove generation of __InitComponentRuntime #4911

Updated

  • Windows FlowDirection #4936
    area/a11y, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [WIP] Enable Window Sizing #4942
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Update WebAuthenticator sample package versions #4945
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Blazor] Align our Blazor Maui template with the Blazor RTM template #4922
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
